title: WHY DO TANKS DO DAMAGE WHEN THEY HAVEN'T BOUGHT DAMAGE ?? MAKES NO SENSE
body: I'M KASSADIN AND I AM PRETTY FED...  A TANK THAT HAS NO DAMAGE ITEMS CAN DO MORE DAMAGE THAN A AP BUILD WITH PENETRATION AND SUSTAINS DAMAGE... SO WHATS THE PURPOSE OF GOING A MAGE AND ALL THESE OTHER PLAYERS WHEN YOU CAN BE A TANK AND JUST CHARGE IN DO DAMAGE AND TAKE NO DAMAGE IT'S A BIT BS IT RUINS LEAGUE OF LEGENDS. IF THEY HAVE 3 TANKS AND U HAVE 1 OR 2 YOU WILL LOSE THE GAME LATE GAME CAUSE TANKS ARE TO OVER POWERED .... I HAVE TO GO BROKEN CHAMPS TO KEEP UP IT'S NOT FUN

replies.body:
Your Kassadin. An assassin not a DPS champion. Your role is to jump into the enemy backline and 2-shot the enemy ADC, not 1v1 the tanks.

- The tanks in question Maokai and Nasus, have good sustain and built MR.

You didn't build a Morello to cut their healing nor a Void Staff to bypass their MR nor a Haunting Guise to shred their HP. you built 0 tank busting items and wonder why you can't damage tanks.

- You built Banshees over Zhonyas and looks like you were building a Luden's or GLP next.

Which is the wrong choice. Your a Kassadin. Banshess is to avoid CC. Use your Ult to avoid CC instead and you save a lot of gold.

- Your cs was 126 at 39 minutes (3.2 per min).

Which is awful.

- You had 3 items plus boots and lvl 16. Your enemies had 4.5 items plus boots and lvl 18.

Of course they are going to be stronger than you.

Stop blaming "bad game mechanics" whens it's you not understanding how your champion is supposed to work and you don't build properly for the situation.

I think you're confusing "discussion" with "ragefest".

Saying you're having a "discussion" implies that you are going into it with a relatively open mind, with the intent of hearing various viewpoints before ultimately reaching a conclusion, all of which is done in a *civilised* manner.

Simply "screaming" about how "BS" it is and that something shouldn't be how you interpret it to be is certainly *not* a "discussion".
Dude my caps isn't me raging it's for people to see it clearly so stop with your attacks on me HEARTVINE oh wait it's caps so that means i'm yelling lol

I dunno about you but honestly all caps is harder for me to read. Harder to put emphasis where you want it and sends all the wrong messages (everyone is going to read it like you're yelling). I'd recommend not posting everything in all caps.
You don't like me fair enough i don't like you too now go away with your negative attitude

Actually, I'm indifferent about you. All I was trying to accomplish with that post was to point out that it's not a "discussion", since you've clearly already come to a definite conclusion (and seem to be dismissive of any opposing ideas). One thing to keep in mind is that, in regards to text communication, all caps is often accepted as the equivalent of yelling, so it's easy to see why someone might "misinterpret" your post as being intended as a "scream post". If you want to put extra emphasis on specific terms/phrases, I'd recommend using *italics*, or even **bold text** (which can be accomplished on the boards using either one or two asterisk "*" [respectively] both at the start and end of the term/phrase you want to emphasise). At the very least, you could simply use caps for only specific terms/phrases to emphasise them relative to the rest of the post, but a post using nothing _but_ caps just comes off as "yelling" to most people.
